sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_1eaec8b52fd03010732c4ae72799b691
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.ShrinkNow</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>ShrinkNow</name><script><![CDATA[var ShrinkNow = Class.create();
ShrinkNow.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	
	saveExpDate: function() {
		var url = this.getParameter('sysparm_url'); 
		var exp_date = this.getParameter('sysparm_exp_date'); 
		
		//pull the url id from the url
		var url_id = url.substring(url.lastIndexOf('/') + 1);
		
		if (this._saveExpDate(url_id, exp_date)) {
			return true;	
		}
		
		return false;
	},	

	setShortURL: function() {
		var longurl = this.getParameter('sysparm_longurl');  
		var instance_url = gs.getProperty('glide.servlet.uri');
		
		// get the company code for the URL
		var comp_code = 'nrvsw';
		
		// generate the shrunk URL
		var url_id = this._createRandomString(8);		
		var shorturl = 'api/' + comp_code + '/shrinknow/map/' + url_id;
		
		var sysid = this._addURL(url_id, longurl.replace(instance_url, ''));
		
		if (sysid) {
			return instance_url  + shorturl;
		}

		return false;
	},
	
	_addURL: function(url_id, longurl) {
		var gr = new GlideRecord('u_shrinknow_urls');
		gr.addQuery('u_url_id', url_id);
		gr.query();
		
		if (!gr.next()) {
			gr.initialize();
			gr.u_long_url = '/' + longurl;
			gr.u_url_id = url_id;
			var sysid = gr.insert();
			
			return (sysid) ? sysid : false;
		}
		
		return false;	
	},
	
	_saveExpDate: function(url_id, exp_date) {
		var gd = new GlideDate(); 
		gd.setValue(exp_date);	
		
		var gr = new GlideRecord('u_shrinknow_urls');
		gr.addQuery('u_url_id', url_id);
		gr.query();
		
		if (gr.next()) {
			gr.u_expires = gd;
			
			if (gr.update()) {
				return true;
			}
		}
		
		return false;	
	},	
		
	_createRandomString: function(size) {
		var chars = '0123456789abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz';
		var random_string = '';
		
		for (var i=0; i<size; i++) {
			random_string += chars[Math.floor(Math.random() * chars.length)];
		}

		return random_string;	
	},
	
    type: 'ShrinkNow'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>rpoore_admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-05-23 21:23:14</sys_created_on><sys_id>1eaec8b52fd03010732c4ae72799b691</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ShrinkNow</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ShrinkNow" source="4dfac4b12fd03010732c4ae72799b6b8">4dfac4b12fd03010732c4ae72799b6b8</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ShrinkNow">4dfac4b12fd03010732c4ae72799b6b8</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_1eaec8b52fd03010732c4ae72799b691</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>rpoore_admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-05-23 21:29:38</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>GET</http_method><name>GET - Redirect</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {

	var url_id = request.pathParams.url_id;

	var gr = new GlideRecord('u_shrinknow_urls');
	gr.addQuery('u_url_id', url_id);
	gr.setLimit(1);
	gr.query();

	if (gr.next()) {
		// set permanent redirect for location header
		response.setStatus(301);		
		response.setLocation(gr.u_long_url);
	}
	else {
		response.setStatus(301);
		response.setLocation('/not_found.do');		
	}

})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/nrvsw/shrinknow/map/{url_id}</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/map/{url_id}</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>false</requires_authentication><requires_snc_internal_role>false</requires_snc_internal_role><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>rpoore_admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-05-23 21:27:54</sys_created_on><sys_id>f6af44392fd03010732c4ae72799b6f3</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GET - Redirect</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ShrinkNow" source="4dfac4b12fd03010732c4ae72799b6b8">4dfac4b12fd03010732c4ae72799b6b8</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ShrinkNow">4dfac4b12fd03010732c4ae72799b6b8</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_f6af44392fd03010732c4ae72799b6f3</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>rpoore_admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-05-23 21:30:32</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="ShrinkNow">b55fc0392fd03010732c4ae72799b68b</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sysauto_script"><sysauto_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><business_calendar/><condition/><conditional>false</conditional><entered_time>1970-01-01 00:00:00</entered_time><name>ShrinkNow - URL Deactivation</name><offset/><offset_type>0</offset_type><run_as display_value="rpoore admin">889070a0db50330040dc9006db961980</run_as><run_as_tz/><run_dayofmonth>1</run_dayofmonth><run_dayofweek>1</run_dayofweek><run_period/><run_start>2021-05-24 02:26:17</run_start><run_time>1970-01-01 05:00:00</run_time><run_type>daily</run_type><script><![CDATA[function deactivateExpired() {
    var gr = new GlideRecord('u_shrinknow_urls');
	gr.addEncodedQuery('u_active=true^u_expiresONToday@javascript:gs.beginningOfToday()@javascript:gs.endOfToday()');
    gr.query();

    while (gr.next()) {
        gr.u_active = false;
		gr.update();       
    }
}

function deleteExpiredAfterYear() {
    var gr = new GlideRecord('u_shrinknow_urls');
	gr.addEncodedQuery('u_active=false^u_expiresONOne year ago@javascript:gs.beginningOfOneYearAgo()@javascript:gs.endOfOneYearAgo()');
    gr.query();

    while (gr.next()) {
        gr.deleteRecord();   
    }
}

deactivateExpired();

deleteExpiredAfterYear();]]></script><sys_class_name>sysauto_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>rpoore_admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-05-24 02:28:26</sys_created_on><sys_id>bd84d9712f183010732c4ae72799b62a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ShrinkNow - URL Deactivation</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ShrinkNow" source="4dfac4b12fd03010732c4ae72799b6b8">4dfac4b12fd03010732c4ae72799b6b8</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ShrinkNow">4dfac4b12fd03010732c4ae72799b6b8</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sysauto_script_bd84d9712f183010732c4ae72799b62a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>rpoore_admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-05-24 02:28:26</sys_updated_on><time_zone/><upgrade_safe>false</upgrade_safe></sysauto_script></record_update>
